mapper.insert: insert into user_borrow_transaction_record( consumer_id, borrow_number, borrow_id, trading_amount, surplus_amount, ip, create_time ) values( #{consumerID}, #{borrowNumber}, #{borrowID}, #{tradingAmount}, #{surplusAmount}, #{clientIP}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update consumer_account set available_balance = #{availableBalance}, version = version+1 where id=#{accountID} and version=#{version}
mapper.select: select record.*, repay.repayment_description as repayment, repay.detail as repaymentDetail, card.sex, retrials.verify_time as fullTime from user_borrow_bid_apply_record AS record LEFT JOIN consumer_repayment_type AS repay ON record.repay_type=repay.id INNER JOIN consumer_info AS info ON record.user_id=info.id INNER JOIN consumer_card AS card ON info.card_id=card.id LEFT JOIN user_borrow_bid_full_retrials AS retrials ON record.borrow_number=retrials.borrow_number where record.id = #{productID}

SELECT DISTINCT record.name, record.borrow_money, record.borrow_time_limit, repay.repayment_description, record.borrow_description, record.lending_rate, record.payment, record.publish_time, auth.create_time, card.sex, TIMESTAMPDIFF( YEAR, card.brithday, CURDATE() ) as age, card.code, address.province, address.city, address.area, address.address, info.is_marry, info.is_car, info.is_house, income.range, WORK.industry, WORK.position, work.income_range_id as income, work.address as wordAddress, auth.create_time AS joinTime FROM user_borrow_bid_apply_record AS record INNER JOIN consumer_repayment_type AS repay ON record.repay_type = repay.id INNER JOIN consumer_auths AS auth ON record.user_id = auth.consumer_id INNER JOIN consumer_info AS info ON record.user_id = info.id INNER JOIN consumer_card AS card ON info.card_id = card.id INNER JOIN consumer_address AS address ON info.address_id = address.id INNER JOIN consumer_activate_verify_record AS verify ON verify.CODE = card.CODE INNER JOIN consumer_income_range AS income ON verify.income_range_id = income.id AND verify.state = 2 LEFT JOIN consumer_work AS WORK ON info.word_id = WORK.id WHERE record.borrow_number = #{borrowNumber} and record.user_id=#{consumerID}
